queries.query:
from(bucket: "nocblecpu")
  |> range(start: -10m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cpu_temp_c")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 10s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> last()

from(bucket: "nocblecpu")
  |> range(start: -10m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "disk" and
    r._field == "used_percent" and r.path == "/"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 10s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> last()

from(bucket: "nocblecpu")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "net" and
    (r._field == "bytes_recv" or r._field == "bytes_sent")
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> yield(name: "bytes_recv_vs_bytes_sent")

from(bucket: "nocblecpu")
  |> range(start: -5m)                                   // ← only the last 5 minutes
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "systemd_units")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field       == "active_code")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.active       == "active" or r.active == "failed" or r.active == "inactive")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.host         == "nocble")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.load         == "loaded")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.name == "mppt_to_influx.service" or r.name == "ssh.service")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.sub          == "running")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "nocblecpu")
  |> range(start: -10m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "pi_throttled")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 10s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> last()

from(bucket: "nocblecpu")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "nstat" and
    (r._field == "TcpInSegs" or r._field == "TcpOutSegs")
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> yield(name: "tcp_segments_rate")

from(bucket: "nocblecpu")
  |> range(start: -10m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "mem" and
    (r._field == "used" or r._field == "total")
  )
  |> pivot(
    rowKey:["_time"],
    columnKey: ["_field"],
    valueColumn: "_value"
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      _value: float(v: r.used) / float(v: r.total) * 100.0
    }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 10s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> last()

from(bucket: "nocblecpu")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "pi_file_count")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last_count")

from(bucket: "nocblecpu")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "pending_updates")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "nocblecpu")
  |> range(start: -10m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "wifi_signal_dbm")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 10s, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> last()

from(bucket: "nocblecpu")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "pkg_install")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> difference(nonNegative: true)                     // compute new – last, clamp negatives to zero
  |> yield(name: "new_value_data")

from(bucket: "nocblecpu")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "nstat" and
    r._field == "UdpInDatagrams"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> yield(name: "udp_packets_in_rate")

from(bucket: "nocblecpu")
  |> range(start: -10m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "gpio18_input")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 10s, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> last()
